attributes.action: Abolish all new laws passed since 23/03/20 relating to covid 19
attributes.additional_details:
Nobody wanted these restrictions or laws in the first place, and with news that the lockdown will be in place until 07/07/21 the laws require abolishment immediately.
Rules such as what have been passed do nothing to stop any virus.
attributes.background:
Abolish all bills and laws passed since 23/03/20 relating to coronavirus.
These restrictions are unlawful and are destroying the uk’s economy and seriously damaging the public’s mental health.
Every single restriction and regulation needs to be abolished. These are a breach of basic human rights.
